p: Using the NCDR database, the total number of psychiatric inpatient admissions for young people in England in March 2020 was 217 (384 in 2019, 359 in 2018 and 414 in 2017 and 2016), the lowest number of admissions in any month since records began. The number of admissions was even lower in April 2020 (244 vs. 398 in 2019, 391 in 2018 and 366 in 2017 and 368 in 2016).
